name: swim-kafka-connect
title: Swim Kafka Connect
description:
Swim is an open-source platform for building real-time streaming applications utilizing stateful microservices while leveraging Kafka and Confluent Cloud. The Swim Kafka Connect library acts as a bridge between Kafka and Swim applications. This library should be configured to send messages generated from Kafka topics to a specified Swim application.
 This library is built off of the Kafka Connect framework.
